DOC.brief_summary: This two-part study evaluate effectiveness etoricoxib control pain participant osteoarthritis experience inadequate response current treatment . In Part 1 , participant receive open-label etoricoxib 60 mg daily . Those participant experience clinically meaningful response etoricoxib 60 mg daily within two week eligible enter double-blind withdrawal period ( Part II ) . Responders enter Part 2 randomize 1:1 ratio receive either etoricoxib 60 mg placebo .
